someone who is suffering from amnesia (= a medical condition in which they lose their memory): Therapy can help amnesiacs regain their memory, either totally or partially.
More examplesFewer examplesShe plays an amnesiac trying to figure out who she is.I can't remember everything, but I'm not an amnesiac.The trouble is people are amnesiacs when it comes to the lessons of history.

used to describe a person suffering from amnesia (= a medical condition in which they lose their memory), or an occasion when this condition is experienced: She was working with amnesiac survivors of the war. an amnesiac experience
causing someone to lose their memory: The medication has some amnesiac effect.
More examplesFewer examplesMatt Damon plays the amnesiac ex-agent Jason Bourne.Dazed and amnesiac, she seeks help from passers-by.Christie was said to have had an amnesiac episode.Amnesiac drugs such as Rohypnol and GHB have been used in rapes.
